鞃鞃鞃

鞃字的基本解释

鞃
hóng
车轼上段裹上皮革以便人倚的部分。

鞃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》胡肱切，平登，匣。］
车轼中段的把手处。

鞃字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞃； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1386第37
【唐韻】丘弘切【集韻】【韻會】苦弘切，?音?。【說文】車軾也。从革弘聲。【詩·大雅】鞹鞃淺幭。【傳】鞃，軾中也。【釋文】苦弘反。又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?胡肱切，音弘。【廣韻】軾中靶也。　又【集韻】姑弘切，音肱。又丘弓切，音穹。義?同。　【玉篇】亦作䩑。【集韻】亦作?䡌䡏。

鞃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鞃字的起名意思

暂无。

leaning board on carriage
Basic explanation of words
leaning board on carriage
hóng
The upper part of the car is covered with leather for people to lean on.
leaning board on carriage
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu humeral cut, Ping Deng, Xia. ]
The handle in the middle section of Che Shi.
leaning board on carriage
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞃; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1386 Page 37
[Tang Yun] Qiu Hongqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ku Hongqie, "Yin". [Said the text] Che Shi also. Congge Hongsheng. 【Poetry·Daya】Ying Ying Qianyao. [Biography] Ying, Shi Zhongye. [Explanation] Kuhong opposes. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Hu Huqie, Yinhong. [Guang Yun] Shi also hit the target.　[Jiyun] Guhong cut, sound brachial. The bow cut again, the sound dome. Righteous? Same.　【Jade articles】also used as a ya. [Ji Yun] also used as a "non-sense".
leaning board on carriage
